hero.title: The platform to find
hero.titleHighlight: the best suppliers for your event
hero.subtitle: Eveo is the marketplace that brings together event organizers and suppliers. Find everything you need for your perfect event, all in one place.
hero.organizerSubtitle: Find verified suppliers for catering, venues, entertainment and much more
hero.supplierSubtitle: Join our network and connect with organizers looking for your services

howItWorks.title: How Eveo Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to connect with perfect suppliers for your event
howItWorks.step1Desc: Describe your event, budget and requirements. Our intelligent system will understand exactly what you're looking for.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Receive personalized recommendations from verified suppliers that match perfectly with your criteria and budget.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Compare quotes, book your preferred suppliers and enjoy your perfectly organized event with peace of mind.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say About Our Beta Launch
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied event organizers and suppliers
testimonials.review1: Eveo made organizing our corporate event incredibly easy. We found the perfect venue and catering in just one afternoon!
testimonials.review2: As a photographer, Eveo has connected me with fantastic clients. The platform is professional and easy to use.
testimonials.review3: The quality of suppliers on Eveo is exceptional. We've organized 5 events through the platform with perfect results.
testimonials.review4: Found the perfect DJ for my store opening through Eveo. The booking process was seamless and stress-free.
testimonials.review5: As a caterer, Eveo has tripled my bookings. The clients are serious and the platform handles everything smoothly.
testimonials.review6: Eveo helped us organize our company's annual conference. Everything was perfect from start to finish.
testimonials.review7: The venue recommendations were spot-on for our product launch. Saved us weeks of research!
testimonials.review8: As a florist, I've found amazing event opportunities through Eveo. The platform really works!
testimonials.review9: Eveo's supplier network is incredible. We've never had such smooth event coordination before.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Eveo
faq.a1: Simply describe your event needs and we'll connect you with verified suppliers that match your requirements and budget. You can compare quotes and book directly through our platform.
faq.a2: Yes! Event organizers can use Eveo completely free. Suppliers pay a monthly or annual subscription to be on the platform and use all services.
faq.a3: All suppliers go through a rigorous verification process that includes business license checks, insurance verification, and portfolio review. We also continuously monitor performance and client feedback.
faq.q4: What types of events do you support?
faq.a4: We support all types of events, from private events to large corporate gatherings. Our suppliers cover everything from venues and catering to entertainment and technical services.

features.title: Why Choose Eveo?
features.subtitle: We make event organization simple by connecting you with the right suppliers
features.perfectMatchDesc: Our intelligent matching algorithm connects you with suppliers that fit exactly your needs and budget

features.verifiedDesc: All suppliers are verified and rated by our community for your peace of mind

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: INFORMATION REGARDING THE PROCESSING OF PERSONAL DATA PURSUANT TO ART. 13 OF EU REGULATION 679/2016
privacy.description: Privacy policy for Eveo - Learn how we protect your personal data

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.content: The Data Controller is Eveo S.r.l., with registered office in {{address}}, represented by its legal representative pro tempore (hereinafter also the "Controller"). For any request or information, you can contact us at the email address: {{email}}.

voluntaryData.title: Data voluntarily provided by the user through forms on www.eveo.it
voluntaryData.name: Name (required)

automaticData.title: Automatically collected data
automaticData.noProfileInfo: No automatically collected data is used to directly identify the user or for profiling activities.

purposes.title: Purposes of Processing and Legal Basis
purposes.waitingList: Creation of a waiting list for users and suppliers interested in receiving quotes for event organization - legal basis: implementation of pre-contractual measures pursuant to art. 6, par. 1, letter b) GDPR
purposes.marketing: Sending updates and promotional communications via email - legal basis: consent of the data subject (art. 6, par. 1, letter a) GDPR)
purposes.analytics: Aggregate web traffic analysis through statistical cookies - legal basis: consent of the data subject (see cookie policy).

dataProvision.title: Nature of Data Provision
dataProvision.content: The provision of data marked with an asterisk (*) is mandatory to be contacted or registered on the waiting list. Failure to provide such data will make it impossible to provide feedback or updates. Consent for promotional purposes is optional and can be withdrawn at any time.

processingMethods.title: Processing Methods
processingMethods.content: Data is processed using electronic and manual tools in compliance with the principles of confidentiality, integrity and availability, with adequate technical and organizational measures (art. 32 GDPR).

dataRecipients.title: Data Recipients
dataRecipients.employees: Authorized employees and collaborators of the Controller
dataRecipients.providers: IT and hosting service providers (data processors)
dataRecipients.authorities: Public entities only in cases required by law
dataRecipients.listAvailable: The updated list of processors is available upon request.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.contactData: Data for contact or waiting list purposes: up to 12 months from collection
dataRetention.consentData: Data processed on the basis of consent: until withdrawal or, at most, 2 years
dataRetention.navigationData: Navigation data: for the time necessary to ensure the functioning of the site

userRights.title: Rights of the Data Subject
userRights.intro: Pursuant to articles 15-22 of the GDPR, the user has the right to:
userRights.complaint: Lodge a complaint with the Supervisory Authority
userRights.contact: To exercise your rights: {{email}}

transfers.title: International Transfers
transfers.content: Data will not be transferred outside the European Economic Area.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy

whatAre.title: What are cookies?
whatAre.content: Cookies are small text files that websites can save on your device (PC, smartphone, tablet) to make your browsing experience more efficient.

typesUsed.title: Types of cookies used on eveo.it
typesUsed.content: This site uses only technical and anonymous statistical cookies:

cookies.noProfilingCookies: No profiling or advertising cookies are used.

purposes.title: Purposes of processing
purposes.technical: Ensure the correct functioning of the site (technical cookies)
purposes.analytics: Collect anonymous statistical data on site usage, useful for improving the user experience

legalBasis.title: Legal basis
legalBasis.content: Consent is not required for technical cookies. For anonymized statistical cookies (e.g., Google Analytics with anonymized IP), consent is not mandatory according to the Guidelines of the Data Protection Authority.

consent.title: Managing consent
consent.content: You can modify or withdraw your consent at any time by clicking on the cookie banner at the bottom of the site or by accessing your browser settings.

contact.title: Contacts and Controller
contact.content: For any information regarding the processing of data through cookies, you can contact:
